column1: This #SmallBusinessSaturday join me in supporting our small businesses here at home in #KS03.  https://t.co/gg3K5WSNmX

Wishing everyone a safe and healthy holiday weekend. I hope you’ll join me in showing our deep gratitude to our essential workers and health care professionals on the frontlines by doing everything we can to stay safe – including wearing a mask and staying socially distant.
I joined @1a this morning to discuss the power of the Native vote and the importance of growing Native representation in Congress. Listen below ⬇️ https://t.co/ic9tt7QZar
Seconded. https://t.co/shskKTb4MC

Growing up with a mom who served in the Army for 20 years I saw first hand the sacrifices our service members make each and every day to keep us safe. Today and every day we honor the brave men and women who have served our country. https://t.co/VLqhdy8fBp

The American people have made their voices heard. They chose an incredible leader in @JoeBiden to move our country forward and to unite all of us during these challenging times. I’m looking forward to working with the Biden-Harris Administration to make progress for #KS03. https://t.co/jeAfpOzcUo
💙💗💙💗  https://t.co/1wgIg0Pa1V

Our victory would not have been possible without your hard work. Every phone call you made text you sent or conversation you had made this possible.  I'll never stop fighting for #KS03.    https://t.co/v0oAP7LqWo
Thank you #KS03. https://t.co/mm8xn80xQd
Polls are now closed in #KS03. If you were in line before polls closed STAY in line! Every vote counts.
It was great to join our friends with UAW to thank them for their support today and to encourage everyone to vote!   If you are in line before the polls close STAY in line. https://t.co/JeTschhfl8
Midday fuel. @SLAPs_BBQ 🔥 https://t.co/pXmjeJN8zU
Starting out Election Day like... https://t.co/EoG2Ir28xg

We made history in 2018.   Are you ready to do it again #KS03? https://t.co/UqzlOj53dS
It’s Election Day and polls are now open in #KS03! If you haven’t already find your polling location here and go vote! https://t.co/iJwTbMpkfP
Overland Park showed UP tonight! Thank you to everyone who joined us in support of @BarbaraBollier and our fantastic local candidates across #KS03. https://t.co/ppOpftkYRD
I might be biased but #KS03 has some of the best volunteers around 😃 Stopped by @JoCoDemsKS office today to thank everyone for their hard work! Let’s bring this thing home. https://t.co/WkEg2C67BS
Record a GOTV video eating pizza they said. It will be easy they said. 🍕🍕🍕 https://t.co/hgW1gKzBFT

All my life I've faced big challenges: raised by a single mom worked my way from community college to the White House. I haven't stopped in Congress.   Watch our final ad of this election: https://t.co/P0RmcGv2rN
A big thumbs up to everyone who turned out in KCK today! Kansans are fired up and ready to elect Democrats up and down the ballot. https://t.co/a7bgZ3fLcT
Natives vote. ✔️ https://t.co/8s5wymkPXz
Kicked off GOTV weekend with special guests Sec. @Sebelius and Gov. @LauraKellyKS! Two days left - let's make them count. https://t.co/YzC4ZT6MNw
Couldn’t have asked for a more beautiful day to talk to voters in KCK alongside @BarbaraBollier!   I’m ready to flip this Senate seat for the first time in 88 years are you? https://t.co/MlHOywYOSb
Halloween may look a little different this year...but this candy still tastes delicious! 🎃 Stay safe and spooky everybody! https://t.co/LFAwIikZ0n
Looking forward to kicking off GOTV weekend with Gov. @LauraKellyKS and Sec. @Sebelius! Sign up to join us for a virtual #KS03 phone bank: https://t.co/Pc4d1ucl1Z https://t.co/w0V6nFXRfn
🚨 Endorsement alert 🚨  It's an honor to be endorsed by the Kansas City Star. I'll never stop fighting to get results for #KS03.  https://t.co/1xhpCLXMk5

I recently had the chance to speak with the National Education Association of KCK and thank them for all their hard work during these challenging times.   We must make sure our educators have the resources they need to help our children & families succeed. https://t.co/SGIlrXu3rB

In the 116th Congress we elected more women people of color and LGBTQ+ people than ever before.   I spoke with Harpers Bazaar about what it's like to be a "first" and why it's so important we continue to break down barriers for those who come next. https://t.co/rG1oj0IiMO

Always great to chat with The Pitch about the biggest issues facing our community - from COVID relief to the best barbecue sauce in town and whether or not Patrick Mahomes should run for President (maybe one day but right now we need him where he is).   https://t.co/voEP6c2P5F

One week.   If I learned anything from my time as a MMA fighter it's that you don't stop until the bell rings.   So let's not take anything for granted and let's give it everything we have over the next 7 days.

You deserve a Representative who will stand up for your values not someone trying to resurrect Sam Brownback’s agenda. I’m running for Congress to move us forward.   My name is Sharice Davids and I would be proud to earn your vote. #KS03

Climate change is real and that change is having real impacts on our economy the water we drink and the air we breathe.  We can fight climate change in a way that cuts pollution AND grows our economy. That's exactly what I'm pushing for. #KS03

During this health and economic crisis I’ve fought to secure aid for small businesses and I wrote legislation to help small businesses make PPE and other essential supplies.   I'll keep fighting to help our workers and small businesses. #KS03 https://t.co/91swteUop2

It’s been such an honor to represent #KS03 over these past two years and I know we have a lot more to do.   I’m proud of my record. I’m proud that a majority of the bills I'm on are bipartisan.  I’ll never stop working to lift up our economy and make healthcare more affordable.
It's almost time for the last #KS03 debate of this election. Don't miss it! https://t.co/nfUQ8Sbf3l
Join us at 2 pm CT today for the second debate of this election hosted by the @KCStar and @fox4kc. Tune in here!   https://t.co/Y4ADu3Npf2

No better way to spend a Saturday afternoon than with the people of #KS03 @BarbaraBollier and @QuintonLucasKC! Thanks to everyone who braved the chilly weather to come and ask questions.   PS — I’m still working on this whole socially distanced selfie thing. https://t.co/FIaSBHwL6x

If you requested a mail-in ballot please be sure to return it in the mail or at a ballot drop box.  If you vote in person after requesting a mail-in ballot you’ll have to cast a provisional ballot — and that could delay the vote count. But no matter what make sure to VOTE! https://t.co/kmHLLoS0E4
Early voting is underway across #KS03 and there was a proud mom at the front of the line this morning! https://t.co/9NNe2zBFPN

You deserve a Representative who will stand up for your values not someone trying to resurrect Sam Brownback’s agenda.   I’m running for Congress to move us forward. My name is Sharice Davids and I would be proud to earn your vote.

You have a very clear choice in this election.   Between someone who embraces Donald Trump and his brand of politics - and someone who knows that we can do better.   Between someone who championed the Brownback tax experiment - and someone who fought against it. #KS03

Too many Kansas families struggle with the price of healthcare and that’s why I’ve fought to bring down the costs including prescription drugs and premiums and to protect people with pre-existing conditions. #KS03 https://t.co/Sqv5PPiKLx

So many families are feeling the anxiety of not knowing how they will be able to pay their bills or put food on the table for their families.   That's why I've voted for bipartisan relief for #KS03 and why I'm pushing for more aid for our families workers and small businesses.

Our country is going through a difficult and long overdue conversation about racial inequality. I've had conversations with community members and law enforcement about what it looks like to build up trust. I'm committed to listening to EVERYONE. That's what #KS03 deserves.

We need more opportunities for everyone in our community. That starts with quality public education. We have to invest in public schools in early childhood education. We also need to make sure that everyone has access to affordable quality health care. #KS03

My opponent has a different view. She was a campaign manager and top advisor for former Governor Sam Brownback.   She worked hard to pass Brownback’s tax plans and cuts to our schools. She even said that he was an “incredible governor.” I disagree. #KS03

I was raised by a single mom Army Veteran. I started out at Johnson County Community College.  Every opportunity I’ve had in my life has stemmed from the fact that I had a good public education.   I want every kid in our community to have that same opportunity to succeed. #KS03

I’m about to take the (virtual) debate stage to share the work I’ve been doing to lower the cost of health care strengthen our public schools and make sure every Kansan is part of our economic recovery. Don’t miss it! #KS03   https://t.co/Cn5C0WfRDI https://t.co/xrL7MB1jSw
TONIGHT: Join #TeamSharice for the first #KS03 debate of this election hosted by the NAACP of Olathe Overland Park and Leawood. Tune in here at 5:30 pm CT.  https://t.co/Cn5C0WfRDI
SO thrilled to have Moms Demand Action Founder @shannonrwatts join us for a phone bank kick off this Saturday at 4pm. Don't miss it! https://t.co/bFXsE07vW1
Love it @KaliforKansas! Kansas women are as strong as they come. 💪🏽🌻 https://t.co/sr1AVbYIPf

We’re faced with unprecedented challenges right now but we’ve also been presented with the opportunity to rebuild our economy and health care system in a way that actually works for Kansans.   My latest for the KC Star ⬇️ https://t.co/Y9kaULQVyd

Today I dropped off my advance ballot in a secure drop box and I was honored to be joined by supporters who were doing the same! Make sure you have a voting plan so your voice is heard this election. #KS03 https://t.co/Cgp272ZMsn
Thank you Governor! https://t.co/8PhShzFKra
16 days. Let's go. https://t.co/DerMDGjZAN
Made some special deliveries today! If you live in #KS03 sign up here to get your yard sign: https://t.co/9ubZ6q1Z0j https://t.co/te7OXnl66O
Powerful words from my colleague @JahanaHayesCT. We should all listen.  https://t.co/RDZPvYOOiu

That's right! I'm consistently blown away by our volunteers in #KS03 who are working hard every day to elect Democrats up and down the ballot.   It's not too late to join us sign up here -->  https://t.co/h7JzsigGh6 https://t.co/PLzxS1qiKI

I've heard health care concerns from over 10000 Kansans since I took office.   That's why health care has been my focus - writing legislation to tackle surprise medical billing and opposing Trump's efforts to end protections for pre-existing conditions. Watch: https://t.co/St22801nyc

📢KANSAS 📢 Today is the LAST day to register to vote in this election!  Register to vote or check your voter registration status by visiting https://t.co/n53HsoOxrv and then make sure all your friends and family do the same.

Last week I had the chance to help deliver groceries to folks in #KS03 during a community food bank hosted by Roeland Park UMC. The need for food security programs has increased drastically due to the coronavirus - and I’m continuing to push for the relief our families need. https://t.co/0BQcLefk2J

It's the honor of a lifetime to be one of the first Native American women in Congress and it's a responsibility I do not take lightly.   Because while @Deb4CongressNM and I might be the first we certainly won't be the last. We'll keep pushing for progress every step of the way.

Happy Indigenous Peoples' Day! Today we celebrate the contributions that Native peoples have made to the country's history while recognizing the persecution and discrimination that our peoples have faced for centuries in our ancestral homelands.

Republicans are openly talking to their mega-donors about their plan to gerrymander Kansas — and they are specifically targeting our campaign.   If you agree that voters should pick their representatives not the other way around chip in here →  https://t.co/KhImGMmvDA
25 days until the most consequential election of our lifetimes.   Let's roll up our sleeves and get this done. 💪🏽 https://t.co/xDih3Yonp6
Hey @StephenAtHome! Thanks for sharing how Kansans can exercise their right to vote this election. Watch #BetterKnowABallot to find out more information ⬇️  https://t.co/yBwwiR3lPJ

🚨 New ad alert! 🚨  The last thing Kansans need after receiving medical care is a bill they never saw coming. That's why I'm working to stop surprise medical billing and make insurance companies accountable and transparent. Watch: https://t.co/NYwHmmz77V
This.👇🏽 https://t.co/M5G6s5t14G

At a time when people across the country are calling out for real leadership this Administration is walking away. It's outrageous and it's wrong.   I'll continue to push for bipartisan COVID relief — Kansans lives and livelihoods depend on it. https://t.co/Sp0ei4iG88

The coronavirus is not over — and neither are the challenges that Kansans face. I'm continuing to push for bipartisan relief to get help to those who need it most.   And as always make sure to wear your mask and practice social distancing. https://t.co/wbYspFi9yn
One month. You ready to make history again #KS03?
We're having regular virtual events between now and November 3rd to reach voters & spread our message across #KS03. Join us! ⬇️⬇️⬇️  https://t.co/l2NhzMi57R
I'm ready! https://t.co/XYKCVu71bG

In Congress I'm fighting to lower the cost of prescription drugs end surprise billing and protect coverage for Kansans with pre-existing conditions. That's the right thing for Kansas families.   Watch our new ad then chip in so we can keep in on air ➡️ https://t.co/FZCQPcNqPu https://t.co/kSrrHe2WyU
Another successful weekend of action in the books! Thanks to all our #TeamSharice volunteers who are working hard to keep this seat blue. 💪🏽 https://t.co/1tYgAoYW2g

Today we honored the life and legacy of Justice Ruth Bader Ginsburg a tireless fighter for justice who broke countless barriers along the way. It’s on all of us to carry on her fight. https://t.co/LhKgzRIn1u

A7: My top priority is ensuring all Americans have access to quality health care - and that includes the full range of reproductive care. I'll keep pushing to provide access to family planning clinics and quality affordable health coverage for everyone.  Thanks @emilyslist! https://t.co/gytHT5HoaO

A6: In this election every single issue we care about – including access to affordable health care – is on the ballot. We must vote and work to elect leaders who will protect our care. #ELCare https://t.co/deNqOeJSvV

A5: My opponent wants to repeal the Affordable Care Act - ripping away health care coverage for millions of Americans in the middle of a global pandemic.    We can't let that happen. #ELCare https://t.co/4AymH3bxvd

A4: COVID-19 has laid bare so many harsh realities that exist in our country - including health disparities. These are complex systemic issues that must be addressed. In the short term we must increase testing support Community Health Centers & expand access to health care. https://t.co/AjGMMMe3rs

A3: In this Congress we've passed dozens of bills to expand access to health care & lower costs. I also championed legislation that would help KS finally expand Medicaid.    Sadly these bills still sit on Mitch McConnell's desk - another reason we must flip the Senate! #ELCare https://t.co/qrMHzgjTJ4

Q2: Health care was the No. 1 issue I heard about on the campaign trail in 2018  — and it’s one reason I beat a four-term Republican incumbent (who repeatedly voted to repeal the ACA) to represent #KS03 in Congress. #ELCare https://t.co/8mAfdSvH18

A1: When I was starting out & buried in student loan debt health insurance wasn't a priority. It wasn't until I was injured at the gym — resulting in an ER visit and $4000 bill — that I realized the cost of forgoing insurance.    Too many of us have felt this same pain. #ELcare https://t.co/VjKdIMCJyr

Four years ago I was selected to serve as a White House Fellow under President @BarackObama.   Today I’m proud to receive his endorsement in my reelection campaign for Congress. Join us —> https://t.co/BlaekXNdje https://t.co/KcHp5eWYWj

This week we passed Savanna's Act legislation I've championed to help address the crisis of missing and murdered indigenous women.   Every Native woman deserves to feel safe in her community and I encourage the President to sign this into law right away. https://t.co/Lf1g4cNCNm
Attention #KS03! If you are voting in Johnson County you can check the status of your mail ballot application at https://t.co/EwAxOOdXXg. https://t.co/8jiCQR0bBV
To restore our democracy (among many other reasons)!   #NationalVoterRegistrationDay https://t.co/SQqIJgZ1Qy

Today is #NationalVoterRegistrationDay  when we recognize the importance of our right - our civic duty - to vote and ensure everyone has the opportunity to vote.   So make sure you’re registered and have a plan to vote on or before November 3rd!  https://t.co/xib7MEMi0L

I’m heartbroken over the passing of Supreme Court Justice Ruth Bader Ginsburg a tireless champion for justice and equality. She fought with grit and determination for the rights of all people under the law - and it’s up to all of us to carry on that fight. https://t.co/RPVQadu5rz
To all those celebrating tonight in #KS03 and beyond I wish you a happy Rosh Hashanah. May the next year bring you health peace and joy. L’Shanah Tovah!
Couldn’t let #ConstitutionDay pass without sharing two items I always keep close these days — my pocket constitution and constitution mask. 🤓 https://t.co/F39VCwCMtC

It is an honor to be endorsed by Vice President ⁦@JoeBiden⁩. I look forward to working with him in the White House to create a better future for #KS03 and to restore the soul of this nation. https://t.co/FU6CENNisY

September is #SuicidePrevention month. Especially during these difficult times it's important we talk about mental health reduce stigma and share resources that can save lives.   If you or someone you know needs help call 800-273-8255 for 24/7 free and confidential support.

The only “F” I’ve ever been proud to receive!   I’ll always stand up to the gun lobby and work to find common sense solutions that keep our children and communities safer from gun violence. https://t.co/C3Q9N0bZyM

We're officially 50 DAYS away from the most consequential election of our lifetimes. We need your help more than ever #KS03. Join us:   Volunteer → https://t.co/BlaekXvBUE Chip in → https://t.co/bSUr9gTAal Make a voting plan → https://t.co/xib7MEuGCb

Today and everyday we remember the thousands of innocent lives lost and honor the brave first responders who put themselves in harm's way to help others on 9/11. We pledge to #NeverForget. https://t.co/t5iUocsuQh

Kansans rely on the Postal Service for essential items like prescription drugs every day—and that's why I've been fighting so hard against Postmaster DeJoy's attacks on this vital institution. We must #SaveThePostOffice.  https://t.co/Ftk6pRj6t6

I'm proud to endorse this strong group of state & local Democrats in Kansas.   If we’re going to make progress on the issues that matter most - from expanding Medicaid to investing in our public schools - then we need to make sure they win big in November. https://t.co/fi6BJfMUcl
WATCH: I'm live with @GovLauraKelly @SecSebelius and @BarbaraBollier to discuss protecting and expanding Kansans' access to health care. Tune in ⬇️  https://t.co/jDwhteva1b

When the coronavirus hit and our economy slowed Kansas businesses took a hit. Yet Wall Street’s booming. It shows the deck is stacked.  That's why I'm working to get COVID aid to small businesses keeping Kansans on the job. Watch: https://t.co/nzMjntLjWA

This Labor Day we thank all our workers—especially those on the frontline who have worked tirelessly to keep our communities running during this crisis.   I hope you all have a safe holiday and remember to wear your mask practice social distancing and wash your hands!

I'm honored to be endorsed by @smartunionworks.    I grew up in a union family. My mom taught me the value of hard work—of fighting for what’s right and what's fair. I'll always stand with working men women & their families & fight for them to have every opportunity to succeed. https://t.co/mRG4Olj3KB

In 2016 there wasn't a single question on climate change in any of the presidential debates.  This can't happen again.  That's why I signed a letter asking @Debates and the moderators to make climate change a part of the 2020 debates. Read more: https://t.co/cmZkUbly1C

I'm proud to be endorsed by the U.S. Chamber.   I'll continue to fight for pro-growth policies that will help move our economy forward particularly in the wake of the coronavirus pandemic. #KS03 https://t.co/chiDTfowLE

BIG NEWS! We are up on TV today!   Coronavirus has impacted how we live learn and work. But as the virus surged and our economy slowed down I knew I couldn't.   Watch our new ad and then chip in $5 to help keep us on air --> https://t.co/iwkB7Rp7LM #KS03 https://t.co/i6rIWv5BrW
WATCH: I'm live with @Tiffany_Muller President of End Citizens United and @DrCameronWebb Candidate for VA-05 to discuss ending the dominance of big money in our politics.  https://t.co/lXqmRJ1BEb
Join @DrCameronWebb @Tiffany_Muller and me tomorrow for a conversation about ending the dominance of big money in our politics. RSVP below! ⬇️   https://t.co/w9fjbG4uss

This week I joined members of the local American Postal Workers Union and supporters at the Shawnee Mission Post Office to demand that we #SaveUSPS and support the hardworking people who keep it running. https://t.co/5iARVtphZ9

Jacob Blake was shot in the back 7 times on Sunday. Now he is paralyzed.   Jacob and his family deserve answers. They deserve justice. And for real justice to be delivered we need to enact meaningful reforms that increase accountability and provide for the safety of all people.

Like everything else the @JoCoDemsKS #ForeverFree2020 Gala looked a little different this year. But the result was the same: #JoCo Dems are fired up & ready to win in November! Thanks to my friend @AdamSchiff for providing the keynote & to everyone who made the night a success! https://t.co/HcdhkSmYGW
Watching my friend make history. ❤️ https://t.co/ixZac6UFc8
So proud of my friend and sister in the fight @Deb4CongressNM. #DemConvention https://t.co/7hryeFexz4

.@JoeBiden has been a leader on LGBTQ issues throughout his career.  With Joe Biden & Kamala Harris in the White House and a pro-equality House/Senate we can finally make the Equality Act law.   We can ensure we protect LGBTQ youth & make the US a leader in LGBTQ equality again. https://t.co/1i6eTcwRey

You most certainly have not lost your voice @GabbyGiffords. Your courage and determination is an inspiration to us all.   Thank you for your tireless fight to end the epidemic of gun violence in America. https://t.co/N1KvMazPLk

100 years ago today the #19thAmendment was ratified –granting women the right to vote. But it would be decades before women of color - many of whom led the fight for voting access - received that same right.  As we honor their work we remember that the fight continues today. https://t.co/faRa178mIR

🚨Our calls are working. This is a start - but a lot more must be done to undo the damage caused by Postmaster General DeJoy and to fully support the Postal Service. I won't stop until that happens.  https://t.co/hHX0Wy2wrD

Supporting our Postal Service shouldn't be a partisan issue.   If we're going to get new leadership in the USPS who will protect our right to vote by mail then we need Republicans to speak out against this Administrations' attacks on our democracy. https://t.co/NrJFEb4RBC

I’m honored to serve as a Vice Chair of the National Democratic Convention as we unite around the critical task of electing @JoeBiden and @KamalaHarris this November. Who's ready? https://t.co/qNiFG9jbFG
https://t.co/9b9Fti588E https://t.co/TfqJQqz39R

I'm proud to endorse @joekennedy for U.S. Senate. He is a champion for anyone overlooked undervalued or cast aside by our system.   That's why I'm with Joe and I hope you will be too. https://t.co/QqfYASvmlC

I’m excited to be part of Campaign Academy 2020: free online trainings during the @demconvention to get volunteers ready for whatever *else* 2020 throws our way. Learn more + sign up at https://t.co/2MccllOXGB.
Imagine how many more lives could have been saved if the President spent as much time working to stop the coronavirus as he has working to stop the vote. https://t.co/OICh2SoOBO
I'll be on @thereidout tonight to talk about the President's attacks against the Postal Service and why the Postmaster General must be removed.   Tune in at 6 pm Central. https://t.co/EKlrpOyZPr

Re-upping. https://t.co/66uZfXEFEi

I will not stand by while this President and his cronies try to tear apart this constitutionally-mandated institution piece by piece in order to serve their political agenda.   The Postmaster General must be removed.  https://t.co/UubcTy6Lff

Seniors veterans folks in rural communities and so many more rely on the postal service every day.   But the President wants to tear it down to *checks notes* win an election. His job security is not more important than our democracy or all the people who need the post office. https://t.co/2dpGNV29Rr
🙋🏽‍♀️🙋🏽‍♀️🙋🏽‍♀️ https://t.co/RlOTTg2vls

An excellent choice! We all need to be united in defeating Donald Trump this November and with @JoeBiden and @KamalaHarris on the ticket that’s exactly what we’ll do.   Let’s get to work. 👊🏽 https://t.co/NC9HZJz9It
We're running — and winning in November.  https://t.co/lU7CiWYAp3

My mom is a postal worker. She works every day to help people ship and receive goods from prescription drugs to mail-in ballots.  Now when we're relying on USPS more than ever it's irresponsible & down right dangerous to push through massive changes.  https://t.co/8FIbpFkVfX
Let’s listen to the experts and mask up #KS03.  https://t.co/iUPpKU2KgM

55 years ago today the Voting Rights Act was signed into law. Today let's honor John Lewis' legacy and recommit to making sure every eligible voter can access the ballot box.   The Senate can start by finally passing the John Lewis Voting Rights Advancement Act.
Zoom vs. reality. https://t.co/YO8S50As2p
It's time for Republicans in the Kansas legislature to end their partisan obstruction and finally work with us to expand Medicaid just as Missourians voted to do yesterday.  https://t.co/kYnA6l2v8M
We made history in 2018. And with your help we’ll do the same in 2020.   Let’s get to work. Join us: https://t.co/BnY01kbDHX

Keep in mind it’s not going to be easy.    We’re going to have to work every day until Nov to make sure we keep this seat blue and keep making progress for our district.  So sign up to volunteer. Chip in what you can. Register to vote & make a plan for how you will vote safely.

We have too much left to fight for to allow this seat to slip back into the hands of the GOP.   We don’t know yet who will come out of tonight’s GOP primary. But we do know this:   They will stop at nothing to repeal the ACA and continue the worst of the Brownback Administration.

But we have a lot of work left to do. And that's why I'm running for reelection.   Our country is in crisis.   The coronavirus showed that our economy and healthcare system need to change. I’m committed to making sure those changes help hardworking Kansans not special interests.

Now I’m proud to be one of the first two Native American women ever to serve in Congress and a member of the most diverse freshman class in US history.   I’m equally proud of all we’ve accomplished - passing bills to lower health care costs limit money in politics and more.

I ran for office to make sure everyone has the same opportunity to succeed that I did.    We began our campaign with 3 people around a kitchen table.   But w/ the help of people in #KS03 we grew that team into a historic campaign that took out a four-term Republican incumbent.

The polls have closed in Kansas and we're officially on our way to the November general election.   Tune in live as I discuss what we've accomplished in the past two years what we have left to do and why we need all hands on deck to keep #KS03 blue.  https://t.co/676xiQxSaj
